artist: After Auguste Louis Lepère; Edmond Sagot
creditline: Gift of Tom and Marsha French in honor of Tom Rassieur
description: sketch of beach scene; two women wearing large hats seated in lounge chairs in foreground; scattered clusters of figures in middle ground and background; calm water; clouds and beams of sunlight; brown and white with ink wash

title: Sur la Plage, Plate 11 from "Cinquante Croquis de Auguste Lepère"
